title: Smart Data models -S-NSSAI  schema"
description: This Class represents an S-NSSAI. An NSSAI is a set of supported S-NSSAI(s), an S-NSSAI is comprised of an SST (Slice/Service type) and an optional SD (Slice Differentiator) field

sST.description: This parameter specifies the slice/service type in a ServiceProfile to be supported by a network slice.
